X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.

id.description: The hashed id of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the vendor.

user_id.description: The hashed id of the user who created the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the user.

assigned_user_id.description: The hashed id of the assigned user to this vendor. This is a unique identifier for the user.

id.description: The hashed id of the vendor contact

user_id.description: The hashed id of the user id

vendor_id.description: The hashed id of the vendor

first_name.description: The first name of the contact

last_name.description: The last name of the contact

contact_key.description: A unique identifier for the contact

confirmation_code.description: The confirmation code used to authenticate the contacts email address

email_verified_at.description: The date which the contact confirmed their email

password.description: The hashed password of the contact

is_primary.description: Boolean flag determining if the contact is the primary contact for the vendor

send_email.description: Flag indicating whether to send emails to this contact

contacts.description: An array of contacts associated with the vendor.

private_notes.description: The private notes of the vendor. These notes are only visible to users with appropriate permissions.
private_notes.example: Shhh, do not tell the vendor

industry_id.description: The industry id of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the industry.

size_id.description: The size id of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the size of the vendor.

address1.description: The first line of the vendor's address.

address2.description: The second line of the vendor's address.

city.description: The city of the vendor's address.

state.description: The state of the vendor's address.

postal_code.description: The postal code of the vendor's address.

phone.description: The phone number of the vendor.

country_id.description: The country id of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the country.

currency_id.description: The currency id of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the currency.

custom_value1.description: The value of the first custom field for the vendor.

custom_value2.description: The value of the second custom field for the vendor.

custom_value3.description: The value of the third custom field for the vendor.

custom_value4.description: The value of the fourth custom field for the vendor.

vat_number.description: The VAT number of the vendor.

id_number.description: The ID number of the vendor.

is_deleted.description: Boolean flag determining if the vendor has been deleted

language_id.description: The language id of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the language.

vendor_hash.description: The vendor hash of the vendor. This is a unique identifier for the vendor.

transaction_name.description: The transaction name of the vendor.

display_name.description: The display name of the vendor.

is_tax_exempt.description: Flag indicating whether the vendor is exempt from taxes

public_notes.description: Notes that are visible to the vendor
public_notes.example: These are public notes visible to vendors

message.description: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
message.example: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
